features: AQuick-Capture Dashboardfor yourprojects,tasks,notes,collateral, andswipe file; Get access to myPMM Swipe Filewithover 450 items, all categorized for easy discovery; Dedicated workspaces for key PMM functions, likeRelease Marketing,Competitive Enablement,Analyst Relations, and more; AnOKR Dashboardfor managing your quarterly goals and tracking your progress; AnInternal Request Dashboardfor collecting and managing project requests from within your company; A collection of product marketingresources,templates, andplaybooksthat will continue to grow.
